name: IndexingSortOptions

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the IndexingSortOption.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the IndexingSortOption with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the IndexingSortOption with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the IndexingSortOptions within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The IndexingSortOption, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: IndexingSortOption, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The IndexingSortOption, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: IndexingSortOption, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first IndexingSortOption in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last IndexingSortOption in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle IndexingSortOption in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the IndexingSortOption with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the IndexingSortOption that follows the desired IndexingSortOption.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the IndexingSortOption whose index follows the specified IndexingSortOption in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The IndexingSortOption whose index comes before the desired IndexingSortOption.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any IndexingSortOption in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every IndexingSortOption in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the IndexingSortOption.
Returns the IndexingSortOption with the specified index.

description: A collection of indexing sort options.
